title: Australia v Argentina: 2025 Rugby Championship – live
summary: The Wallabies are set to face Argentina, who recently achieved a surprising victory over the All Blacks. Jonathan Howcroft will provide minute-by-minute updates on the match. Fans can expect an exciting clash as both teams seek to continue their momentum.

title: TV tonight: did Freddie Mercury have a secret daughter?
summary: Recent allegations that shook the music industry are being thoroughly examined. Additionally, Mel and Sue return with a new quiz show for viewers. Here are tonight's top watching recommendations.

title: UK phone retailers lock shop doors while trading to tackle rising thefts
summary: In response to a staggering 967% rise in theft incidents, companies are contemplating the implementation of "kill switches" to disable stolen devices. This measure aims to enhance security and deter theft. The initiative reflects growing concerns over device security amid rising crime rates.

title: Blind date: ‘He didn’t find it weird that I arrived at the date using a homemade treasure map’
summary: Joe, a 31-year-old office manager, encounters Mabyn, a 36-year-old theatre costume designer. Their meeting marks a new connection in their professional and personal lives. The story explores the dynamics of their relationship as they navigate their differing careers.

title: Millions of UK mobile phones to receive test emergency alert on Sunday
summary: At 3 PM, devices will vibrate and emit a siren sound for 10 seconds as part of a test alert. The alert will include a message confirming it is a test. This exercise aims to evaluate emergency alert systems.
